title: Every Lil Wayne and Drake Collaboration Ever
content:
Home > News > Every Lil Wayne and Drake Collaboration Ever Every Lil Wayne and Drake Collaboration Ever Sep 15th, '15  •  News  •  by XXL Staff  •  No Comments 1 of 35 Drake-VS-Lil-Wayne-Tour-Announcement Lil Wayne and Drake have been collaborating together on tracks for a while now, dating back to the time when Weezy signed the Toronto MC to his Young Money imprint in June of 2009. And while many see Drake as one of the premier MCs in the game right now, Wayne still has something to say about that. “I annihilate that guy,” Wayne said during a podcast interview this week when asked if he or Drake is a better rapper. And while Weezy has plenty of history to back himself up after 20 years in the hip-hop game, Drake has been on a winning streak for a long, long time now. So does Wayne still have a point? Or is Drizzy finally coming for his label boss' throne? We collected every collab between Drake and Wayne over the years in one place to let you decide. Who's the better rapper? lil-wayne-dedication-3
